name: #01/08 Skiomenteia's mark - MIRAMARKA NFTC S01
description: The Skiomanteia bloodline is considered to be one of the most ancient one on Earth. Its first appearance can be traced back to the year 267 AD. Their ability to animate the inanimate has earned them a great place in history as they were of the highest authority in the field of medicine. From tissue regeneration, to intensive care of sick people, many of them have used their talents in the service of the common good. Others, more discreet, only used their for fun, creating a flame in non-living bodies, totems, golems or any other creature born from their fantastic creativity. Ultimately, there is a forbidden use of this power,  members who choose the path of evil and indulge in a macabre imagination, resurrection and control of the dead. — MIRAMARKA NFT collectibles season 1, a collection of 8 rare cards that will be minted in 8 pieces only — miramarka.com
